lesson.title: Must - Have To - Have Got To: Obligation and Deduction

modules.name: Learn
modules.title: Obligation Modals Lessons
modules.instructions: Master the usage of 'Must', 'Have To', and 'Have Got To' to express obligation, necessity, prohibition, and logical deduction.

modules.name: Write
modules.title: Writing Practice
modules.instructions: Write sentences using must, have to, and have got to in different contexts: obligation, necessity, prohibition, and deduction.

modules.name: Play
modules.title: Grammar Games
modules.instructions: Play games to practice choosing between must, have to, and have got to in real-life situations.

modules.name: Quiz
modules.title: Quick Quiz
modules.instructions: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions about must, have to, and have got to. Choose the correct answer to practice quickly!

modules.name: Apply
modules.title: Obligation Challenge
modules.instructions: Apply must, have to, and have got to correctly in various contexts and understand their nuanced differences.
